fields.name: bin
fields.label: BIN
fields.description: The Building Identification Number (BIN) from NYC Department of Buildings

fields.name: interior_sq_ft
fields.label: Finished space
fields.description: Total measurable finished space, in square feet.

fields.label: Legal rooms
fields.description: Number of legal rooms in the unit.

fields.name: original_legal_room_count
fields.label: Original legal rooms
fields.description: Original number of legal rooms when the unit was built.

fields.name: city_view_type
fields.label: City View Type
fields.description: How obstructed is the city view? (Full/Partial)

fields.label: River View Type
fields.description: How obstructed is the river view? (Full/Partial)

fields.name: park_view_type
fields.label: Park View Type
fields.description: How obstructed is the park view? (Full/Partial)

fields.name: has_floor_laundry
fields.label: Building floor laundry
fields.description: Does building floor have laundry? Yes or No

fields.name: has_air_conditioning
fields.label: Air Conditioning
fields.description: Does the unit have air conditioning? Yes or No

fields.name: has_juliette_balcony
fields.label: Juliette Balcony
fields.description: Does the unit have a Juliette Balcony? Yes or No

fields.name: has_balcony_or_terrace
fields.label: Balcony or Terrace
fields.description: Does the unit have a Balcony or Terrace? Yes or No

fields.name: has_washer_dryer
fields.label: Washer Dryer
fields.description: Does the unit have washer or dryer? Yes or No
